RSE - Ricerca sul Sistema Energetico SpA informs that the optional, explicit and voluntary sending of personal data by completing the registration form or other modules on the site involves the acquisition of the sender's contact details, necessary to have access to the material to download, as well as all personal data voluntarily included in communications. RSE SpA uses persistent registration cookies: the cookies memorize navigation information that is used by RSE SpA to check and improve the dissemination of the results of its research activities and to keep track of the type of dissemination that took place in accordance with the public interest scientific dissemination pursued. The Registration cookie was created by RSE SpA for its own site and cannot be read by other sites.
For further information, please refer to the full text of the privacy policy.

initialMessage.title: Per accedere:
initialMessage.content:
This tool allows you to download the thirty-year hourly historical series (1990-2019) of wind speed (m/s).
It is necessary to wait for the loading of a grid in which the territory is discretized and, subsequently, to select the cell corresponding to which the data is to be downloaded.
A window will therefore open in which it is necessary to indicate the e-mail address to which the data will be sent, the years for which to request the data and the desired format.
To finalize the request, click on the "Run" button. A message confirming the data request will then appear.

A few hours after the request, the user will receive the data via e-mail in a .zip folder. It is specified that the user will receive an email for each wind height.
